SELECT A.AGGREGATION_UUID aggregationUuid, result.ITEM_CODE code, result.TITLE title, code_detail.CODE_NAME retentionPeriodName, -- 보존기간 A.DESCRIPTION_START_DATE descriptionStartDate, A.DESCRIPTION_END_DATE descriptionEndDate, result.INITIAL_DATE initialDate, result.DISPOSAL_DUE_DATE disposalDueDate, result.DISPOSAL_COMPLETE_DATE disposalCompleteDate from RC_AGGREGATION A INNER JOIN (select * from rc_item B inner join RS_RECORD_SCHEDULE_RESULT C ON B.ITEM_UUID = C.ITEM_UUID where disposal_complete_date is null ) result ON result.AGGREGATION_UUID = A.AGGREGATION_UUID INNER JOIN RS_RECORD_SCHEDULE schedule ON schedule.RECORD_SCHEDULE_UUID = result.RECORD_SCHEDULE_UUID INNER JOIN RS_GENERAL_RECORD_SCHEDULE general ON general.GENERAL_RECORD_SCHEDULE_UUID = schedule.GENERAL_RECORD_SCHEDULE_UUID INNER JOIN AD_CODE_DETAIL code_detail ON code_detail.CODE_DETAIL_UUID = general.RETENTION_PERIOD_UUID
1 = 1 AND A.AGGREGATION_UUID = #{aggregationUuid}
AND result.DISPOSAL_DUE_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{disposalDueDateStart},'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND result.DISPOSAL_DUE_DATE <= TO_DATE(#{disposalDueDateEnd},'yyyy-mm-dd')
